cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_address to unreachable IP '10.0.0.1' will cause routing failure as the CU cannot establish SCTP connection to the DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting remote_n_address to unreachable IP '10.0.0.1' will cause routing failure as the DU cannot establish SCTP connection to the CU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 remote_n_address 設定為無法到達的 IP '10.0.0.1' 會導致路由失敗，因為 DU 無法與 CU 建立 SCTP 連接。
